Body: I was totally looking forward for the update but nothing happened, even when I went to look for updates. Weird. It's a Moto X 2nd generation, with Verizon as my provider and hasn't been rooted. I have no idea why it wouldn't update, I tried looking it up but couldn't find any definite answers.At one point since the release I have had to reset my phone, and the update still hasn't happened, so I'm sure that anything that could've been blocking it should be gone, if that's a possibility.I have thought about rooting it, but not only am I unsure of how, I don't know how to tell if my phone'll get bricked.
Title: Why won't my phone update to Lolli, and can I force it to?

history.Text: I was totally looking forward for the update but nothing happened, even when I went to look for updates. Weird. It's a Moto X 2nd generation, with Verizon as my provider and hasn't been rooted. I have no idea why it wouldn't update, I tried looking it up but couldn't find any definite answers.At one point since the release I have had to reset my phone, and the update still hasn't happened, so I'm sure that anything that could've been blocking it should be gone, if that's a possibility.I have thought about rooting it, but not only am I unsure of how, I don't know how to tell if my phone'll get bricked.
Why won't my phone update to Lolli, and can I force it to?
